price: 96. Ya soló, baye bandimaki mpe bazalaki kosala misala milamu Ar-Rahmân akopesa bango bolingo mpe bango bakolinga ye.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sayajʿalu lahumu al-raḥmānu wuddan
